thread.title: Bridge office interiors.
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Bridge office interiors.

author: Bridge office interiors.
title: Bridge office interiors.
text:
We purchased and new shower cartridge but was not sure if the the one shown on their web site was the same as it appeared the design had change.
Email pictures of the old one and they confirmed that the new design would work - very helpful and it did.
